import React from 'react'; const EmployeeTable = (props) => { {props.state.filterdEmployees.map((employee) => { const { first, last } = employee.name; const fullName=`${first} ${last}`; return ( ); })}
Image props.sortBy("name", "last", "first")}>Name Phone Email D.O.B
{fullName} {employee.phone} {employee.email} {dob}
} export default EmployeeTable;
